title: One Star
reviewContent: I bought 2 iPhones with this seller, both have problems and I can't return them.

title: Severly scratched and dented, won't even turned on.
reviewContent: I don't know what they called certified refurbished, but all i received was a severly dented and scratched phone with a new screen. Also, it won't even turn on! DON'T BUY AND WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THIS.

title: Thanks for the STOLEN phone.
reviewContent: The phone was in okay shape. Some dings around the camera area but it was marked STOLEN when we tried to activate it. Haven't been able to activate it yet but we will keep you posted.

title: AVOID
reviewContent: I ordered the iPhone 6 64 gigabyte and looking through the package, the iPhone is freaking bent. Wasted my time and money. AVOID LIKE HERPES

title: Phone constantly crashes. Battery is junk. Sold me ...
reviewContent: Phone constantly crashes. Battery is junk. Sold me a piece of junk and I want my money back. Don't buy. Spend the extra cash and go through a decent company

title: PISSED
reviewContent: Dont waste your time! They sent me a locked phone that I can't even use!!! It literally says unlocked in the description but my phone is VERY LOCKED. I can't get it turned on..

title: I received the package but when I opened the box ...
reviewContent: I received the package but when I opened the box I did not have the cell phone, I need the cell phone or to get the money back

title: Scam phone
reviewContent: I brought this phone for my younger brother, everything was fine until I took the phone to the cell phone carrier, they told me who ever had the phone before had bill they still haven't paid off from T-Mobile so they can't turn the phone on

title: No iphone
reviewContent: I got this iPhone 6, open the box and there was the accesorios but no iphone. I'm very disappointed
